page.title: 03M62 MOTORWAY - CENSUS
page.content:
Six different groups of children carried out a census of the traffic on the motorway at{junction 20} of the M62. The dates and times of their observations were: {1)Tuesday, 28th. May, 1985, 11.25 - {11.45 a.m.} 2)Wednesday, 29th. May, 1985, 2.05 - 2.25 p.m. The count was of {cars, heavy goods {vehicles, and coaches and vans} in both westbound (towards Liverpool) and eastbound (towards Leeds and Hull).
WESTBOUND EASTBOUND {(1)} (2) {(1)} (2) Cars { 487} 210 {540} 463 HGV {217} 206 {223} 266 Vans {203} 86 {270} 317 { }
